content.raw:
On the sdformat.org page for [physics](http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=physics) the example is for version 1.5 but it needs to be upgraded to 1.6. Namely, the <gravity> tag should be removed, because it is no longer valid. Side question: where did it go? I now get the warning:

    Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[gravity], child of element[physics] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[gravity]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
content.html:
On the sdformat.org page for physics the example is for version 1.5 but it needs to be upgraded to 1.6. Namely, the <gravity> tag should be removed, because it is no longer valid. Side question: where did it go? I now get the warning:

Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[gravity], child of element[physics] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[gravity]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
